description: Creates a privacy budget template for a specified membership. Each membership can have only one privacy budget template, but it can be deleted and recreated. If you need to change the privacy budget template for a membership, use the  UpdatePrivacyBudgetTemplate operation.

parameters.name: membershipIdentifier
parameters.description: A unique identifier for one of your memberships for a collaboration. The privacy budget template is created in the collaboration that this membership belongs to. Accepts a membership ID.

parameters.name: autoRefresh
parameters.description: How often the privacy budget refreshes.

parameters.name: privacyBudgetType
parameters.description: Specifies the type of the privacy budget template.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Specifies your parameters for the privacy budget template. differentialPrivacy (dict) --- An object that specifies the epsilon and noise parameters. The epsilon value that you want to use. Noise added per query is measured in terms of the number of users whose contributions you want to obscure. This value governs the rate at which the privacy budget is depleted.

nested_params.name: differentialPrivacy
nested_params.description: An object that specifies the epsilon and noise parameters.

nested_params.name: epsilon
nested_params.description: The epsilon value that you want to use.

nested_params.name: usersNoisePerQuery
nested_params.description: Noise added per query is measured in terms of the number of users whose contributions you want to obscure. This value governs the rate at which the privacy budget is depleted.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: An optional label that you can assign to a resource when you create it. Each tag consists of a key and an optional value, both of which you define. When you use tagging, you can also use tag-based access control in IAM policies to control access to this resource. (string) --- (string) ---

nested_items.name: privacyBudgetTemplate
nested_items.description: A summary of the elements in the privacy budget template.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the privacy budget template.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the privacy budget template.

nested_items.name: membershipId
nested_items.description: The identifier for a membership resource.

nested_items.name: membershipArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the member who created the privacy budget template.

nested_items.name: collaborationId
nested_items.description: The unique ID of the collaboration that contains this privacy budget template.

nested_items.name: collaborationArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the collaboration that contains this privacy budget template.

nested_items.name: createTime
nested_items.description: The time at which the privacy budget template was created.

nested_items.name: updateTime
nested_items.description: The most recent time at which the privacy budget template was updated.

nested_items.name: privacyBudgetType
nested_items.description: Specifies the type of the privacy budget template.

nested_items.name: autoRefresh
nested_items.description: How often the privacy budget refreshes.

nested_items.name: parameters
nested_items.description: Specifies the epsilon and noise parameters for the privacy budget template.

nested_items.name: epsilon
nested_items.description: The epsilon value that you specified.

nested_items.name: usersNoisePerQuery
nested_items.description: Noise added per query is measured in terms of the number of users whose contributions you want to obscure. This value governs the rate at which the privacy budget is depleted.
